title: Premiere: Alice Gray – Pink Cadillac
content:
Colossal ambition on this radio ready debut single from Alice Gray, coming in somewhere between the high energy pop of Sigrid and the more luxurious, elegance of Lana Del Rey.

Pink Cadillac is a real heart on sleeve moment, full of wistful longing, and just perfect for these languid summer days. With an enviable Instagram following already behind her, and a striking sense of direction to the aesthetic surrounding the project, it may be early days, but there’s plenty to Alice Gray to suggest she’s one to keep an eye on. Check out Pink Cadillac below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
